title: Gen 1 Pikachu

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Growl: Lower a target's attack by 1 tier this night and the next one. (Learned at night 1)
- ⚡Thundershock: Deal a basic attack to a target. (Learned at night 1)
- ⚡Thunder Wave: Inflict Paralysis on a target, they have a 25% chance of being roleblocked every night and their actions will have the lowest possible priority, targets will know they are paralyzed. (Learned at night 2)
- Quick Attack: Instantly deal a Basic attack to a target. (Learned at night 3)
- Swift: Deal a Powerful attack to a target, cannot fail by any means other than natural defense. (Learned at night 5)
- Agility: During the day, choose to act twice next night. (2 uses, learned at night 5)
- ⚡ Thunder: Deal an Unstoppable attack to a target, might be inaccurate, having an equal chance to hit a random person visiting your target instead. (Learned at night 7)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are given 3 names at the start of the game, once per game, you may choose one of them to be your trainer.
- Learned at X night abilities can only be used on the learned night or after, For each kill you get, all your abilities get learned 1 night before.
- Gain basic Defense at night (4 - kills), gain Powerful defense at night (7 - kills).
- ⚡ attacking abilities have their tier switched based on target's role, ⚡ non-attacking abilities fail on completely negated targets.
> Lowered by 1 tier: Electricity, Grass and Dragon related roles.
> Increased by 1 tier: Water, Flying/Bird related roles.
> Completely negated: Ground related roles.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure your trainer wins or survives.
